alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Petroleum; Southwest Phillips (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 12 at 2:32AM MST until January 14 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 60 below zero. * WHERE...Central and Southeast Phillips, Petroleum and Southwest Phillips Counties. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Cold weather is expected to continue into the early next week. Wind chills as low as 45 below may be possible beyond the warning time.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Phillips; Petroleum; Southwest Phillips
